intent_atoms.description: Streaming walker must clamp traversal to parent ranges and emit payload.truncated issues when payload bytes run short.
Decoder failure issues will be wired into CLI/app summaries once issue aggregation APIs land.
VoiceOver regression pass for accessibility shortcuts requires macOS and iPadOS hardware verification to confirm focus command menus announce controls and restore focus targets.
Real‑world assets such as Dolby Vision, AV1, VP9, Dolby AC-4, and MPEG‑H fixtures must be secured before regression baselines can shift from synthetic payloads.
Snapshots and CLI fixtures should refresh whenever schema updates are intentional via ISOINSPECTOR_REGENERATE_SNAPSHOTS=1 swift test --filter JSONExportSnapshotTests.

functional_units.name: Binary Reader Guards
functional_units.description: Clamps traversal to parent ranges and emits payload.truncated issues when payload bytes run short during streaming walk

functional_units.name: Decoder Failure Aggregation API Integration
functional_units.description: Wires archived decoder failure issues into CLI/app summaries once issue aggregation APIs are available

functional_units.name: VoiceOver Accessibility Verification
functional_units.description: Verifies that focus command menus announce controls and restore focus targets on macOS and iPadOS hardware

functional_units.name: Real-World Asset Licensing
functional_units.description: Secures licensing for Dolby Vision, AV1, VP9, Dolby AC-4, and MPEG-H fixtures to shift regression baselines from synthetic payloads

functional_units.name: Snapshot & CLI Fixture Refresh
functional_units.description: Refreshes snapshots and CLI fixtures when schema updates are intentional via ISOINSPECTOR_REGENERATE_SNAPSHOTS environment variable
